Description: Wooden anthropoid inner-coffin; painted detail on plaster; Hieroglyphic text.
Curator's comments: Published : PM I Part 2: p.638 Taylor in Davies, Colour and Painting (2001), 164ff, col. pl. 51 [2, 4]. N. Billing, Nut the Goddess of Life, USE 5 (2002), p. 408, fig. E.4 (drawing with the goddess).
Acquisition name: Donated by: Government of the British Protectorate of Egypt
